summary: a field-deployable field-deployable RT-iiPCR reagent set targeting the E gene for rapid detection of ZIKV in human and mosquito specimens spiked with ZIKV showed an agreement of 90% (k = 0.80), 92% (k = 0.82), 95% (k = 0.86), 92% (k = 0.81), 90% (k = 0.79), and 100% (k = 1). a field-deployable system can be used as electronic supplementary material available to authorized users. supplementary material available to authorized users.
